survey_name: Customer Satisfaction Survey for Online Music Streaming Services
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from users about their experience with online music streaming services to help improve service quality and user satisfaction.

questions.question_text: Which online music streaming service do you primarily use?
questions.routing_logic: This question is shown to all respondents.
questions.client_notes: Ensure the 'Other' option includes a text field for respondents to specify.
questions.scripter_notes: Use a single-choice radio button with an optional text field for 'Other'.

script.question_text: Which online music streaming service do you primarily use?
script.routing_logic: This question is shown to all respondents.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with your primary music streaming service?
questions.routing_logic: This question is shown to all respondents.
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for measuring satisfaction levels.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with your primary music streaming service?
script.routing_logic: This question is shown to all respondents.

questions.question_text: What features do you value the most in your music streaming service? (Select all that apply)
questions.routing_logic: This question is shown to all respondents.
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections and include an 'Other' option with a text field.
questions.scripter_notes: Use a multi-choice checkbox with an optional text field for 'Other'.

script.question_text: What features do you value the most in your music streaming service? (Select all that apply)
script.routing_logic: This question is shown to all respondents.

questions.question_text: How often do you experience technical issues (e.g., buffering, app crashes) with your streaming service?
questions.routing_logic: This question is shown to all respondents.
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point frequency scale to assess technical issues.

script.question_text: How often do you experience technical issues (e.g., buffering, app crashes) with your streaming service?
script.routing_logic: This question is shown to all respondents.

questions.question_text: Please describe any specific issues or challenges you have faced while using your music streaming service.
questions.routing_logic: This question is shown to respondents who selected 'Sometimes', 'Often', or 'Very often' in Q4.
questions.client_notes: Use an open-ended question to gather detailed feedback on technical issues.
questions.scripter_notes: Use an open-text field with a character limit of 500.

script.question_text: Please describe any specific issues or challenges you have faced while using your music streaming service.
script.routing_logic: This question is shown to respondents who selected 'Sometimes', 'Often', or 'Very often' in Q4.

questions.question_text: Would you recommend your primary music streaming service to others?
questions.routing_logic: This question is shown to all respondents.
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point likelihood scale to measure Net Promoter Score (NPS) potential.

script.question_text: Would you recommend your primary music streaming service to others?
script.routing_logic: This question is shown to all respondents.

questions.question_text: What improvements would you like to see in your music streaming service?
questions.routing_logic: This question is shown to all respondents.
questions.client_notes: Use an open-ended question to gather suggestions for improvement.
questions.scripter_notes: Use an open-text field with a character limit of 500.

script.question_text: What improvements would you like to see in your music streaming service?
script.routing_logic: This question is shown to all respondents.
